name: Wolfenstein
description:
Versión DVD para Wine64 Vanilla/Staging

RaPiMoDEBianPaKaGer
notes:
Si tienes problemas con la versión de Steam Instala:

vcrun2005 (Lo trae el instalador DVD)

files.wolf: N/A:Señala el instalador, solo para iniciar

content:
files:
- wolf: "N/A:Se\xF1ala el instalador, solo para iniciar"
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Wolfenstein/SP/Wolf2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Wolfenstein/SP
installer:
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    description: Installing DirectX 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
    silent: true
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43
    description: Installing d3dcompiler43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/
    silent: true
wine:
  MouseWarpOverride: disable
